Episodes.Title: Scary Sucky Noise
Episodes.Plot: The adventures of two aliens as they learn about Earth. In this first episode, the WotWots investigate a strange noise.

Episodes.Title: Fruity Loopies
Episodes.Plot: DottyWot makes loopy fruities for breakfast, and SpottyWot realises his long drinking straw is like a giraffe's neck

Episodes.Title: Lanky Landing Legs
Episodes.Plot: DottyWot spots a pair of unusual pink legs through the Sneak-a-peek.

Episodes.Title: Spot a DottyWot
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot looks for his sister using a Sneak-a-peek, but ends up finding a new animal instead.

Episodes.Title: Stripe a Lotty Wotty
Episodes.Plot: The aliens follow a stripy animal and decide they would like to have stripes too.

Episodes.Title: Plodda Lotty
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot is in a mood to zoom and is frustrated that his sister is not moving fast enough. However, he is impressed when he finds a creature that does everything slowly

Episodes.Title: Drowsy DottyWot
Episodes.Plot: On a warm and sunny day, the big-hearted aliens decide to join the animals of the zoo in taking a midday nap.

Episodes.Title: Top and Tail
Episodes.Plot: Spottywot's chair runs out of fuel, leaving him hanging from the ship's rail and he discovers he is not the only one who can swing from his hands

Episodes.Title: Fluffy Puffies
Episodes.Plot: Dotty watches cloud shapes drift by and looks for animals at the zoo that are just as fluffy and white

Episodes.Title: Coughy Wot
Episodes.Plot: pottyWot's chair has a cold and keeps sneezing, so the duo try to it cheer up

Episodes.Title: Stretch and Grow
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot finds an animal that can show him how to stretch. Narrated by Nicholas Parsons

Episodes.Title: Sneaky Squawky?
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot is upset when his brightest shiny crayons go missing, so his sister sets out to find them for him

Episodes.Title: Twisty Sticks
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot is upset when his antenna goes straight and spiky - until he finds an animal who is proud to be covered in lots of prickly bits

Episodes.Title: Skip-a-Lotty Wotty
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot loves to skip and bounce, and goes to the zoo to find out what creatures do the same.

Episodes.Title: Bubblywots
Episodes.Plot: ?The alien duo get the hiccups after finishing their fizzy drinks

Episodes.Title: Egg Sighting
Episodes.Plot: The aliens learn about warning signs around the zoo and make a giant notice for their egg-shaped ship to warn off any giant hens that try to sit on it.

Episodes.Title: HicHoppity Wot?
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot gets the hiccups, so DottyWot heads out into the zoo to investigate a croaking animal that seems to have the same complaint

Episodes.Title: Creepalongy Wot
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot investigates how animals camouflage themselves in the zoo, to help him sneak up on his sister.

Episodes.Title: Blinky Winky
Episodes.Plot: SpottyWot has a staring contest with DottyWot, before visiting the zoo to discover which creatures can out-stare his sister.

Episodes.Title: Topsy Turvy Wotty
Episodes.Plot: The aliens learn about creatures that hang upside down when SpottyWot does stunts in his flying chair and DottyWot visits the zoo
